Package WarGames

Interface Courses

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Course

    public interface Courses
    this is the interface for Courses the boolean isVisible(): precondition the professor has posted an assignment to course postcondition: returns true or false (visible or invisible) boolean hasAssignment(): precondition, checks if assignment objects exist in assignment postCondition: returns true if exist returns false if not
